pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Science Box of Pandora Miscellaneous // Tool collection for common and not so common data science use cases. This includes custom made algorithms for data management as well as value calculations that are hard to find elsewhere because of their specificity but would be a waste to get lost nonetheless. Currently available functionality: find sub-graphs in an edge list data.frame, find mode or modes in a vector of values, extract (a) specific regular expression group(s), generate ISO time stamps that play well with file names, or generate URL parameter lists by expanding value combinations.
